title: Subtraction Facts to 10

vocab.definition: To take away or remove some from a group
The answer when you subtract one number from another
The word and sign (-) that means subtract

teachingNotes: Use crossing out and manipulatives. Connect to real-life situations like eating cookies or losing toys. Practice fact families.

shortanswer.question: If you know that 3 + 4 = 7, what subtraction facts can you make?

wordProblems.question: There were 9 birds in a tree. 5 birds flew away. How many birds are still in the tree?
